content.query:
-- USE realtor
-- GO

-- DROP VIEW IF EXISTS ldw.vListings
-- GO
-- IF OBJECT_ID('ldw.vListings') IS NULL
  
    CREATE VIEW ldw.vListings
    AS
        SELECT
        *
        FROM
            OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'https://dlsprimarystorage.dfs.core.windows.net/realtor/raw/2023/*/*/*.parquet',
            FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
            )
        WITH (
            [ListingId] int,
            [MlsNumber] nvarchar(20),
            [PublicRemarks] nvarchar(4000),
            [BathroomTotal] nvarchar(100),
            [Bedrooms] nvarchar(100),
            [SizeInterior] nvarchar(100),
            [StoriesTotal] nvarchar(100),
            [BuildingType] nvarchar(100),
            [Price] nvarchar(100),
            [PropertyType] nvarchar(100),
            [AddressText] nvarchar(300),
            [Longitude] float,
            [Latitude] float,
            [ParkingSpaceTotal] nvarchar(100),
            [TypeId] int,
            [OwnershipType] nvarchar(100),
            [AmmenitiesNearBy] nvarchar(500),
            [ConvertedPrice] nvarchar(100),
            [ParkingType] nvarchar(100),
            [PriceUnformattedValue] float,
            [SizeTotal] nvarchar(100),
            [SizeFrontage] nvarchar(100),
            [PostalCode] nvarchar(10),
            [ProvinceName] nvarchar(50),
            [RelativeDetailsURLSlug] nvarchar(300),
            [ListingStatusId] int,
            [RelativeURLEn] nvarchar(300),
            [RelativeURLFr] nvarchar(300),
            [ListingInsertedDateUTC] bigint,
            [TimeOnRealtor] nvarchar(100)            
        ) AS listings;

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM ldw.vListings;

-- -- CREATE VIEW ldw.vListings
-- -- AS
-- SELECT     
--    --  TOP 10 
--     --  fullResults.filename() as file_name
--     -- ,Id
--     -- ,MlsNumber
--     -- ,PublicRemarks
--     -- CAST(JSON_VALUE(listings, '$.Id') AS bigint) listing_id,
--     -- CAST(JSON_VALUE(listings, '$.MlsNumber') AS nvarchar(12)) mls_number
--     listing.Id listing_id,
--     listing.MlsNumber mls_number,
--     listing.PublicRemarks public_remarks,
--     listing.PostalCode postal_code,
--     listing.ProvinceName province_name,
--     listing.StatusId listing_status_id,
--     CAST((CAST(listing.InsertedDateUTC AS BIGINT) - 599266080000000000) / 10000000 / 24 / 60 / 60 AS datetime) listing_date_utc,
--     listing.TimeOnRealtor time_on_realtor,
--     listing.Bathrooms bathrooms,
--     listing.Bedrooms bedrooms,
--     listing.SizeInterior size_interior,
--     listing.Stories stories,
--     listing.BuildingType building_type,
--     listing.BuildingAmenities building_amenities,
--     listing.BuildingType building_type,
--     listing.HasOpenHouseUpdate has_open_house,
--     listing.RelativeDetailsURL relative_url,
--     listing.LandSizeTotal land_size_total,
--     listing.LandSizeFrontage land_size_frontage,
--     property.Price property_price,
--     property.Type property_type,
--     property.AddressText property_address,
--     property.ParkingSpaceTotal property_parking_total,
--     property.TypeId property_type_id,
--     property.OwnershipType property_ownership_type,
--     property.ConvertedPrice property_converted_price,
--     property.ParkingType propery_parking_type,
--     property.PriceUnformattedValue property_unformatted_price
